headline: Insider Buying And Dividend Shape W. R. Berkley Risk Reward Tradeoff
summary: Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance Co. Ltd., a 10% owner of W. R. Berkley, has disclosed significant insider buying of NYSE:WRB shares. The purchase was reported in a recent regulatory filing and reflects an increase in its existing stake. W. R. Berkley also announced its regular quarterly cash dividend for shareholders. For investors watching NYSE:WRB, this combination of insider buying and a declared cash dividend is a meaningful update. The stock most recently closed at $71.7, with returns of...
